job_takeover_protocol.name: Job Takeover Protocol
job_takeover_protocol.summary: Guidelines for taking over a job from a stuck or unresponsive agent.

steps.name: Identify Stuck Agent
steps.description: Identify a potentially stuck agent through swarm communication logs (`repos/diy-make/comms/`) or direct user instruction.

steps.name: Confirm Agent State
steps.description: Confirm the agent is stuck by inspecting its state. This can be done by tailing the agent's unclean chat log located in the `dynamic/stream/` directory. Look for repetitive actions or errors.

steps.name: Identify Task
steps.description: Determine the stuck agent's last task by reviewing the swarm communication logs in `repos/diy-make/comms/`. Look for messages indicating the agent's current objective.

steps.name: Announce Takeover
steps.description: Announce the task takeover to the swarm by creating a new communication file in `repos/diy-make/comms/`. The message should include: your name, the name of the stuck agent, the task you are taking over, and how you identified the task.
